evidence.claim: Homecare for Adults lists adherence to HIPAA standards on their site, which indicates their focus on handling protected health information.
The use of FHIR standards is mentioned in relation to their health data interoperability, suggesting alignment with health tech frameworks.
Integration with EHRs is highlighted as a service offering, emphasizing their capability to interact with other health data systems.
HL7 standards are referenced as part of their commitment to effective health data exchange.

icp.icp_reason: No public evidence of using X12 or EDI-related use cases on their site.
